editorParams.TITLE: name
editorParams.PARSESCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","type":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[ \s])+?)"}/g,(match, id, name, identifier, type, icon) => { const tempIcon = icon.trim(); const params = JSON.stringify({ id, name, identifier, type, }); return `${tempIcon} ${identifier} ${name}`;}).replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[ \s])+?)"}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replace(/#{id=(.+?),name=(.+?),identifier=(.+?),icon=((.|[ \s])+?)}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replaceAll(/\{"\emoji":"(.+?)"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})
